name: The Memory Club (IVY/ÆVI)
description:
It's time to go home after a long night of jamming hard in a Berlin club, but alas! You have lost multiple belongings during your visit at the club. 

Use the mouse cursor to find your lost belongings.

---

A game by Anna Margrét Jónudóttir and Mylene Ben Osman.

This game was developed in the Game Design department at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences, supervised by Csongor Baranyai.
